application.model

Interface ITodoList

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TodoList

    public interface ITodoList
    Represents an ITodoList Interface

             Todo todo)
      throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        index - the index of the existing todo
        todo - the new todo to be inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when there is an error setting todo
